description: Get the TCG Player's Manual and become an officially recognized TCG player.
requirements: Complete Come Try Genius Invokation TCG!.
steps: Go to the empty table to learn the rules from Diona
Have a Genius Invokation TCG duel with Sucrose
Go to Margaret and Claim the Casket of Tomes
Find a player and have a duel
Have a Genius Invokation TCG duel with Fischl

description: Reach Player Lv.10.
Obtain 10000 Lucky Coins in total
Obtain 70000 Lucky Coins in total
Obtain 150000 Lucky Coins in total
Cause a total of 30 Elemental Reactions in victorious matches.
Cause a total of 150 Elemental Reactions in victorious matches.
Cause a total of 300 Elemental Reactions in victorious matches.
Deal 8 or more points of damage in one single action a total of 1 time(s) in victorious games.
Deal 8 or more points of damage in one single action a total of 5 time(s) in victorious games.
Deal 8 or more points of damage in one single action a total of 10 time(s) in victorious games.
Play a total of 60 Action Cards in victorious matches.
Play a total of 300 Action Cards in victorious matches.
Play a total of 600 Action Cards in victorious matches.
Play a total of 20 Summons in victorious matches.
Play a total of 100 Summons in victorious matches.
Play a total of 200 Summons in victorious matches.
Use 3 or more Elemental Bursts and achieve victory in a total of 1 match(es).
Use 3 or more Elemental Bursts and achieve victory in a total of 5 match(es).
Use 3 or more Elemental Bursts and achieve victory in a total of 10 match(es).
Withstand a total of 30 damage using shields or healing in victorious matches.
Withstand a total of 150 damage using shields or healing in victorious matches.
Withstand a total of 300 damage using shields or healing in victorious matches.
Defeat 2 or more Character Cards from the opponent's deck in one single action a total of 1 time(s) in victorious games.
Defeat 2 or more Character Cards from the opponent's deck in one single action a total of 5 time(s) in victorious games.
Defeat 2 or more Character Cards from the opponent's deck in one single action a total of 10 time(s) in victorious games.
